column5: Sunny 5 Bedroom Home close to Lake Grapevine, Gaylord Texan, Grapevine Mills. Kitchen with granite and stainless steel appliances. 30 minute drive to downtown Dallas or downtown Fort Worth. Hardwood floors throughout ground floor and staircase. New carpet and paint throughout with renovated bathrooms. Walk to walking trails, lake and parks and enjoy this family friendly neighborhood.
column8: 5BR Home close to Lake & Many Area Attractions
